nodes.name: Init
Set channel parameters
calculate virtual values
Set LED value on bridge
set error
Set log file name
nodes.func:
msg.logfile = "bridge-" + env.get("NR_FLOW_NAME") + ".log"

return msg;

nodes.name: send virtual data
Set init image
Subscribe to commands for this bridge
Error
nodes.func:
node.warn("The bridge configuration is wrong!")
node.done()

nodes.name: prepare write data
Write data
Update LED Image
Update LED Metric
Styles
nodes.format:
<script id="logo-script" type="text/javascript">
    $(function () {
        const logoId = 'logo-div';
        var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
        if(!toolbar.length) return;
        if($("#" + logoId).length > 0) return;

        var div = $('<div/>');
        div[0].style.margin = '10px 0px 10px auto';
        div.attr('id', logoId);

        var logo = new Image();
        logo.src = 'https://github.com/MUV-Digital/resources/blob/main/img/TRIOPAN_LOGO.jpg?raw=true'
        logo.height = 36;
        
        div.append(logo);
        toolbar.append(div);
    });
    $('link[rel="shortcut icon"]').attr('href', 'https://github.com/MUV-Digital/resources/blob/main/img/TRIOPAN_LOGO.jpg?raw=true');
    $('link[rel="icon"]').attr('href', 'https://github.com/MUV-Digital/resources/blob/main/img/TRIOPAN_LOGO.jpg?raw=true');
</script>
<style>
    md-list-item .md-avatar {
        border-radius: 0% !important;
    }
<\style>

nodes.name: Get available images

selectedJimpFunction.name: print aligned
selectedJimpFunction.description: Print text to the image

parameters.name: font
parameters.hint: font to print. NOTE: This can be one of the presets or the path to a fnt file

selectedJimpFunction.name: write
selectedJimpFunction.description: Write to file. NOTE: You can specify an alternative file extension type to change the type. Currently support types are jpg, png, bmp.

nodes.name: Update LED Metrics
Set brightness

selectedJimpFunction.name: resize
selectedJimpFunction.description: resize the image. One of the w or h parameters can be set to automatic ("Jimp.AUTO" or -1).

parameters.name: w
parameters.hint: the width to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

parameters.name: h
parameters.hint: the height to resize the image to (or "Jimp.AUTO" or -1)

selectedJimpFunction.name: composite
selectedJimpFunction.description: composites another Jimp image over this image at x, y

parameters.name: x
parameters.hint: the x position to blit the image

parameters.name: y
parameters.hint: the y position to blit the image
